description: Lenart Kova, using his experience with legacy infrastructure, discreetly authors and deploys a puzzle app update designed to scatter resistance clues around Stenograd. He acts on tips from underground contacts, prioritizing subtle coordination over open confrontation.

The popular puzzle app unveils daily cryptic challenges. Early solvers begin tracing solutions to physical city locations, unwittingly initiating a scavenger hunt that draws diverse citizens into a web of covert discovery.

Player groups locate the first hidden caches, uncovering materials that detail the names and disappearance dates of 'invisible' citizens. Word spreads quickly through social feeds and encrypted channels, causing concern and curiosity.

Innovators within the Council flag the coordinated citizen activity for investigation, suspecting the puzzle app as a vector for resistance. Directorate responds by increasing BCI enforcement and issuing warnings about unauthorized gatherings.

As rising numbers of citizens participate, news of systematic erasure and manipulation reaches the general public. Spontaneous protests erupt citywide, demanding answers and accountability. The Council faces intensifying pressure and growing dissent.
